verses.verse: Hear <WH8085> this word<WH1697>, ye kine<WH6510> of Bashan<WH1316>, that are in the mountain<WH2022> of Samaria<WH8111>, that oppress<WH6231> the poor<WH1800>, that crush<WH7533> the needy<WH34>, that say<WH559> unto their lords<WH113>, Bring<WH935>, and let us drink<WH8354>.

The Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069> hath sworn<WH7650> by his holiness<WH6944>, that<WH3117>, lo, the days shall come<WH935> upon you<WH5375>, that they shall take you away with hooks<WH6793>, and your residue<WH319> with fish-hooks<WH1729>.
And ye shall go out<WH3318> at the breaches<WH6556>, every<WH802> one straight before her<WH7993>; and ye shall cast yourselves into Harmon<WH2038>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

and offer<WH6999> a sacrifice of thanksgiving<WH8426> of that which is leavened<WH2557>, and proclaim<WH7121> freewill-offerings<WH5071> and publish<WH8085> them<WH3651>: for this pleaseth<WH157> you<WH1121>, O ye children of Israel<WH3478>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

And I also have given<WH5414> you cleanness<WH5356> of teeth<WH8127> in all your cities<WH5892>, and want<WH2640> of bread<WH3899> in all your places<WH4725>; yet have ye not returned<WH7725> unto me<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.

So two<WH8147> or three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> wandered<WH5128> unto one<WH259> city<WH5892> to drink<WH8354> water<WH4325>, and were not satisfied<WH7646>: yet have ye not returned<WH7725> unto me<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.

I have smitten<WH5221> you with blasting<WH7711> and mildew<WH3420>: the multitude<WH7235> of your gardens<WH1593> and your vineyards<WH3754> and your fig-trees<WH2132> and your olive-trees<WH8384> hath the palmer-worm<WH1501> devoured<WH398>: yet have ye not returned<WH7725> unto me<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.

I have sent<WH7971> among you the pestilence<WH1698> after the manner<WH1870> of Egypt<WH4714>: your young men<WH970> have I slain<WH2026> with the sword<WH2719>, and have carried away<WH7628> your horses<WH5483>; and I have made the stench<WH889> of your camp<WH4264> to come up<WH5927> even into your nostrils<WH639>: yet have ye not returned<WH7725> unto me<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.

I have overthrown<WH2015> cities among you<WH430>, as when God overthrew<WH4114> Sodom<WH5467> and Gomorrah<WH6017>, and ye were as a brand<WH181> plucked out<WH5337> of the burning<WH8316>: yet have ye not returned<WH7725> unto me<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.
Therefore thus will I do<WH6213> unto thee<WH3478>, O Israel; and because<WH6118> I will do<WH6213> this unto thee<WH3559>, prepare to meet<WH7125> thy God<WH430>, O Israel<WH3478>.
